io.froilanandfriends.atm

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.froilanandfriends.atm.AccountManager

  • public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Class AccountManager

    Factory class managing and modifying all accounts

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUserToCurrentAccount(int userID)
      Adds the user that matches the given userID to the currently selected account logs accounts after adding the user
      void addUserToCurrentAccount(User user)
      Adds the given user object to hte currently selected account logs accounts after adding the user
      void clearCurrentAccount()
      Sets this AccountManager's currentAccount to null
      Account createAccount(Account.AccountType accountType)
      Creates an account and sets it as the currently selected account relies on an AccountFactory for account creation rewrites the log once hte new account is created
      Account createAccount(java.lang.String loadString)
      * Creates an account based on a string from a record file     * relies on an AccountFactory to create the account     * does not update the log file, as the created account was read in from the log     * @param loadString one line from the account record file     * @return returns the created account
      void deleteAccount(long accountIDtoDelete)
      Deletes an account with id accountIDtoDelete if it exists updates the log file once the account has been deleted
      void deposit(double amountToDeposit)
      Deposits the given amount into the current account logs accounts after the money has been deposited
      Account getAccount(long accountIDtoGet)

      Returns the singleton instance of AccountManager
      java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAllAccounts()
      returns all the accounts in the system

      returns the currently selected account

      returns the id of this AccountManager's current account

      returns a list of accounts that the current user is linked wth

      Reads in all account records from FILEPATH Calls FileIO.readRecords, passing in PATHNAME
      void logAccounts()
      logs all the accounts to the file at FILEPATH

      Removes the user matching the given id from the curreent account logs accounts after removing
      void removeUserFromCurrentAccount(User user)
      Removes the passed User object from the current account logs accounts after removeing the user
      static void setPATHNAME(java.lang.String PATHNAME)
      Sets the file path for the account record file
      void switchAccount(long accountIDtoSwitchTo)
      switches this AccountManager's currentAccount to accountIDtoSwitchTo
      void transfer(long accountNumber, double amountToTransfer)
      Transfers the given amount from the current account into an account matching the given id updates the account logs once the transfer has finished
      void withdrawl(double amountToWithdrawl)
      Withdraws the given amount from the current account logs the account record after the withdraw

        Parameters:

      • loadAccounts

        public void loadAccounts()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads in all account records from FILEPATH Calls FileIO.readRecords, passing in PATHNAME
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the file can't be read

      • logAccounts

        public void logAccounts()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        logs all the accounts to the file at FILEPATH
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the file can't be written

      • createAccount

        public Account createAccount(Account.AccountType accountType)
        Creates an account and sets it as the currently selected account relies on an AccountFactory for account creation rewrites the log once hte new account is created
        Parameters:
        accountType - the type of account that should be created
        Returns:
        the newly created account

      • createAccount

        public Account createAccount(java.lang.String loadString)
        * Creates an account based on a string from a record file     * relies on an AccountFactory to create the account     * does not update the log file, as the created account was read in from the log     * @param loadString one line from the account record file     * @return returns the created account

        Parameters:
        accountIDtoDelete - the account id to delete

                     double amountToTransfer)

        Parameters:
